title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Workplace Learning Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational science knowledge and workplace experience
context.additional_context: Mid-level vocational training for general citizens in science fields, emphasizing personal device use and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners will successfully complete collaborative tasks by utilizing effective interpersonal skills in the workplace.
Learners will explain systematic methods for acquiring and applying new scientific knowledge.
Learners will present strategies for flexibly responding to changes in the work environment by applying them to real-world cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
